Mother: “I’ve always loved you, Rodya.”  

Rodya: “You must believe I love you more.”  

Mother: “What sorrow is hidden from me?”  

---  

<setup: mother’s concern, worried expression>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Mother: “You’re going away, aren’t you?”  

Rodya: “Yes.”  

Mother: “I can come with you, if needed.”
